xaeroplus.setting.transparent_worldmap_b: 월드맵에 검은색 대신 투명 배경을 렌더링합니다
xaeroplus.setting.fps_limiter.tooltip: FPS 제한을 적용하여 미니맵을 렌더링하여 게임 FPS에 미치는 영향을 줄입니다.
xaeroplus.setting.fps_limiter_limit.tool: 설정할 FPS 제한. 낮은 FPS 제한 = 높은 게임 FPS.
xaeroplus.setting.fast_mapping.tooltip: 매핑 속도를 높이지만 FPS에 영향을 줄 수 있습니다. FPS를 회복하려면 속도 제한과 지연 시간을 조정하세요.
xaeroplus.setting.fast_mapping_delay.too:
Fast Mapping must be enabled. 
 This is roughly the delay in milliseconds between minimap update operations, both render and actual file writes.
xaeroplus.setting.fast_mapping_rate_limi:
Fast Mapping must be enabled. 
 Limits how many chunks can be written in a single cycle. Lower values improve FPS at high render distances.
xaeroplus.setting.fast_zip_writes.toolti: Writes Map tile zip files faster but uses more RAM. Disable this if you have low RAM available.
xaeroplus.setting.region_write_while_dim: Fixes Xaero's WorldMap not writing/loading chunks you load while viewing another dimension.
xaeroplus.setting.baritone_waypoint.tool: Syncs Baritone goals as temporary waypoints.
xaeroplus.setting.baritone_path.tooltip: Renders the current Baritone path on the WorldMap and Minimap
xaeroplus.setting.baritone_path_color.to: Sets the color of the Baritone path
Sets the color opacity of the Baritone path
xaeroplus.setting.spawn_point_waypoint.t:
Sets a waypoint at the last set respawn point. 
 Only tracks spawn points while this setting is enabled. 
 Only supports tracking bed or respawn anchor interacts
xaeroplus.setting.pearl_waypoints.toolti: Detects, saves, and syncs stasis pearls you throw to waypoints
xaeroplus.setting.disable_waypoint_shari: Disables waypoint sharing with other players.
xaeroplus.setting.plain_waypoint_sharing: Shares waypoints as human readable text
xaeroplus.setting.disable_receiving_wayp: Disables receiving waypoints from other players.
xaeroplus.setting.deathpoints_render_dis: Apply waypoint render distance limits to Deathpoints
xaeroplus.setting.waypoint_set_change_to: Disables the on-screen text displayed when the Waypoint Set is switched
xaeroplus.setting.persist_dimension_swit: If enabled, the dimension will not be switched back to current when the WorldMap GUI is closed.
xaeroplus.setting.radar_while_dimension_: Disables WorldMap radar rendering while dimension switched.
xaeroplus.setting.transparent_obsidian_r: Makes obsidian placed at build height transparent. Does not update tiles already mapped - you need to remap them.
Sets the min Y level of the transparent obsidian roof.
Sets the opacity of the transparent obsidian roof tiles.
Sets the opacity of snow on top of the obsidian roof.
xaeroplus.setting.min_zoom.tooltip: Minimum WorldMap Zoom Setting. This is 10x what you see on the WorldMap.
xaeroplus.setting.cross_dimension_cursor: When viewing the Nether/Overworld dimensions render the corresponding opposite dimension's coordinates on the WorldMap's cursor coordinates.
xaeroplus.setting.palette_new_chunks_hig: Detects NewChunks based on received chunk data palettes. Works in all vanilla dimensions, more reliable than liquid flow method.
xaeroplus.setting.palette_new_chunks_ver: Detects chunks newly upgraded from a previous MC version, overworld/nether only. Slightly higher chance for actual new chunk detection false negatives.
xaeroplus.setting.palette_new_chunks_sav: Saves and loads NewChunk data to disk for each world and dimension. Requires Palette NewChunks to be enabled.
xaeroplus.setting.palette_new_chunks_opa: Sets the color opacity of Palette NewChunk highlights
xaeroplus.setting.palette_new_chunks_col: Sets the color of Palette NewChunk highlights
xaeroplus.setting.palette_new_chunks_inv: Renders the inverse of Palette NewChunks, meaning chunks you load that were already generated
xaeroplus.setting.new_chunks_highlightin: Detects NewChunks based on the liquid flow states in chunks. Does not work in chunks without liquid flowing or in the End
xaeroplus.setting.new_chunks_save_load_t: Saves and loads NewChunk data to disk for each world and dimension. Requires NewChunk Highlighting to be enabled.
xaeroplus.setting.new_chunks_opacity.too: Changes the color opacity of Liquid NewChunks.
xaeroplus.setting.new_chunks_color.toolt: Changes the color of Liquid NewChunks.
xaeroplus.setting.new_chunks_inverse_ena:
Highlights chunks that have already been loaded by checking if any flowing liquid is present. 
 
 Keep in mind there will be false positives. Multiple biomes and structures like bastions and basalt deltas can generate with flowing liquid.
xaeroplus.setting.new_chunks_inverse_col: Changes the color of Liquid NewChunks inverse highlights
xaeroplus.setting.new_chunks_only_above_: Limits Liquid NewChunks search to Y levels greater than 0
xaeroplus.setting.old_chunks_highlightin: Highlights OldChunks on the Minimap and WorldMap. An OldChunk is a chunk that was generated in 1.12.2 or lower based on the blocks present in the chunk. Intended for use on 2b2t.
xaeroplus.setting.old_chunks_inverse.too: Highlights chunks that were generated in 1.13 or higher. The opposite of OldChunks.
xaeroplus.setting.old_chunks_save_load_t: Saves and loads OldChunk data to disk for each world and dimension. Requires OldChunk Highlighting to be enabled.
xaeroplus.setting.old_chunks_opacity.too: Changes the color opacity of OldChunks.
xaeroplus.setting.portals.tooltip: Highlights chunks where Nether Portals and End Portals are found.
xaeroplus.setting.portals_save_load_to_d: Saves and loads Portals data to disk for each world and dimension. Requires Portal Highlights to be enabled.
xaeroplus.setting.portals_opacity.toolti: Changes the color opacity of Portal Highlights.
xaeroplus.setting.portals_color.tooltip: Changes the color of Portal highlights.
xaeroplus.setting.world_tools.tooltip: Highlights chunks downloaded by WorldTools while a capture is active.
xaeroplus.setting.world_tools_opacity.to: Changes the color opacity of WorldTools highlights.
xaeroplus.setting.world_tools_color.tool: Changes the color of WorldTools highlights.
Highlights chunks where portals could have been loaded into. 
 This is useful for basehunting to detect where players could switch dimensions along a trail to avoid hunters. 
 One thing to note: 2b2t's view distance is not large enough to detect portal skip areas. You need to load surrounding chunks - specifically a 15x15 chunk area.
xaeroplus.setting.portal_skip_opacity.to: Changes the color opacity of Portal Skip Detection.
xaeroplus.setting.portal_skip_color.tool: Changes the color of Portal Skip Detection.
xaeroplus.setting.portal_skip_search_del:
Portal Skip Detection must be enabled. 
 This is the delay in ticks between Portal Skip Detection search operations.
xaeroplus.setting.portal_skip_portal_rad: The chunk radius the server loads immediately around a portal exit during a teleport.
xaeroplus.setting.portal_skip_new_chunks:
Uses NewChunks to determine if a chunk was not loaded before. Therefore a portal could not have been created in its radius. 
 Requires NewChunks to be enabled.
xaeroplus.setting.portal_skip_old_chunks:
Uses OldChunks Inverse to determine if a chunk was not loaded before. Therefore a portal could not have been created in its radius. 
 Requires OldChunks inverse to be enabled.
xaeroplus.setting.breadcrumbs.tooltip: Highlights chunks you have visited. You can configure the radius of chunks around the player to be highlighted
xaeroplus.setting.breadcrumbs_save_load_: Saves and load Breadcrumbs data to disk for each world and dimension. Requires Breadcrumbs to be enabled
xaeroplus.setting.breadcrumbs_chunk_radi: The chunk radius around the player's path that is highlighted
xaeroplus.setting.breadcrumbs_color.tool: Changes the color of Breadcrumb highlights
xaeroplus.setting.breadcrumbs_opacity.to: Changes the color opacity of Breadcrumb highlights
xaeroplus.setting.spawn_chunks.tooltip: Renders the states of spawn chunks: entity processing, redstone processing, lazy, and worldgen
xaeroplus.setting.player_spawn_chunks.to: Renders the states of simulated spawn chunks around the player: entity processing, redstone processing, lazy, and worldgen
xaeroplus.setting.spawn_chunks_redstone_: Toggles whether the redstone processing radius is rendered
xaeroplus.setting.spawn_chunks_outer_chu: Toggles whether the outer chunk radius is rendered
xaeroplus.setting.spawn_chunks_entity_pr: Sets the color of entity processing chunks
xaeroplus.setting.spawn_chunks_redstone_: Sets the color of redstone processing chunks
xaeroplus.setting.spawn_chunks_lazy_chun: Sets the color of lazy chunks
xaeroplus.setting.spawn_chunks_outer_chu: Sets the color of outer chunks
Renders lines over the positions of highways on 2b2t
xaeroplus.setting.2b2t_highways_width.to: Sets the width of the highway lines
xaeroplus.setting.2b2t_highways_color.to: Sets the color of highway lines
Sets the color opacity of highway lines
xaeroplus.setting.map_art_grid.tooltip: Renders areas where map arts will be created
xaeroplus.setting.map_art_grid_color.too: Sets the color of the grid
xaeroplus.setting.region_grid.tooltip: Renders a grid around region borders
xaeroplus.setting.region_grid_color.tool: Sets the color of the grid
xaeroplus.setting.region_grid_text.toolt: Renders the region coordinates of each region
xaeroplus.setting.old_biomes_enabled.too:
Highlights chunks that match the 2b2t 1.12.2 biomes. 
 Due to chunk blending during the 1.12.2 chunk upgrade, OldChunks cannot always detect 1.12.2 chunks. 
 This module is only active in the overworld and will detect many chunks as false positives, although OldBiome chunk trails should be fairly obvious.
xaeroplus.setting.old_biomes_save_load_t: Saves and loads OldBiomes data to disk.
xaeroplus.setting.old_biomes_opacity.too: Configures the color opacity of OldBiomes highlights
xaeroplus.setting.old_biomes_color.toolt: Sets the color of OldBiomes highlights
xaeroplus.setting.wdl_highlight.tooltip: Highlights chunks WDL mod has downloaded on the Minimap and WorldMap.
xaeroplus.setting.wdl_opacity.tooltip: Changes the color opacity of WDL chunks.
xaeroplus.setting.wdl_color.tooltip: Changes the color of WDL chunks.
xaeroplus.setting.lava_columns.tooltip: Highlights and variably colors nether chunks that contain lava columns based on the column's height
xaeroplus.setting.lava_columns_min_heigh: Configures the minimum column height before a highlight is rendered
xaeroplus.setting.lava_columns_color.too: Sets the color of lava column highlights
xaeroplus.setting.lava_columns_save_load: Toggles whether lava column highlights are saved to disk
xaeroplus.setting.ow_auto_waypoint_dimen: Prefer creating and viewing Overworld waypoints when in the nether.
xaeroplus.setting.show_waypoint_distance: Display the distance to every waypoint in the full waypoint menu.
xaeroplus.setting.show_coords_in_right_c: Toggles whether coordinates are shown in the right click options menu on the WorldMap
xaeroplus.setting.show_render_distance.t: Show server side render distance (actually just another setting).
xaeroplus.setting.show_world_border.tool: Renders a rectangle on the current world border
xaeroplus.setting.null_overworld_dimensi:
Sets whether the overworld WorldMap directory is in DIM0 or null (default) 
 MC must be restarted for changes to take effect.
xaeroplus.setting.data_folder_resolution:
Sets how the WorldMap and Waypoints data folders are resolved. 
 You must rejoin the current server for settings to take effect. 
 IP = Server IP (Xaero Default). Example: .minecraft/xaero/world-map/Multiplayer_connect.2b2t.org 
 SERVER_NAME = MC Server Entry Name. Example: .minecraft/xaero/world-map/Multiplayer_2b2t 
 BASE_DOMAIN = Base Server Domain Name. Example: .minecraft/xaero/world-map/Multiplayer_2b2t.org
xaeroplus.setting.transparent_background: Makes the minimap background transparent instead of black.
xaeroplus.setting.minimap_scaling.toolti:
Multiplies the render scaling of the minimap. 
 Increases the amount of chunks in view. 
 To reduce visual artifacting, set within 2 of the Minimap Size Multiplier value. 
 Moderate FPS impact. FPS Limiter strongly recommended if set > 2.
xaeroplus.setting.minimap_size_multiplie:
Multiplies the size of the minimap. 
 For best results, increase only when increasing Minimap Scaling. 
 No FPS impact.
xaeroplus.setting.minimap_render_z_offse: Determines whether other GUI's render in front or behind the minimap. Lower Z = further behind
xaeroplus.keybind.world_map_baritone_goa: If pressed while viewing the WorldMap, sets a Baritone goal
xaeroplus.keybind.world_map_baritone_pat: If pressed while viewing the WorldMap, sets a Baritone goal and paths to it
xaeroplus.keybind.world_map_baritone_ely: If pressed while viewing the WorldMap, sets a Baritone goal and starts elytra pathing to it
xaeroplus.setting.nether_cave_fix.toolti:
Forces full cave maps to be written and rendered when cave mode is off in the nether. 
 Without this, you have to manually move region files pre WorldMap 1.30.0 to the correct cave folder.
xaeroplus.setting.always_render_player_n: Always render player name on the radar.
xaeroplus.setting.always_render_player_i: Always render player icon on the radar.
xaeroplus.setting.fix_main_entity_dot.to: Fixes the main entity dot rendering on the radar when arrow is rendered.
xaeroplus.setting.waypoint_beacon_scale_:
Sets the minimum scale of the waypoint beacon when it is far away. 
 This value is the number of chunks away from the player the beacon is rendered at. 
 0 = auto-match the player's render distance.
xaeroplus.setting.waypoint_beacon_distan: Sets the minimum xz distance from the player the waypoint must be to render a beacon.
xaeroplus.setting.waypoint_eta.tooltip: Renders the estimated time of arrival on waypoint distance text. The ETA is based on the player's current speed and movement direction
xaeroplus.setting.waypoint_eta_measureme: How frequently to update the current speed measurement in ticks. Higher values may help smooth out speed fluctuations. 1 tick = 50ms
xaeroplus.setting.allow_longer_waypoint_: Removes the 2 character size limit when editing waypoint initials
xaeroplus.setting.disable_internet.toolt:
Disables WorldMap and Minimap mods from using the internet to check for updates and patreon subscriptions at launch. 
 Xaero mods do not expose this setting in the GUI normally. 
 XaeroPlus does not use the internet regardless of this setting.
xaeroplus.setting.radar_hide_invisible_e: Configures whether invisible or sneaking entities are rendered on the radar
xaeroplus.setting.expanded_settings.tool: Increases the number of settings shown per page on larger screens
xaeroplus.setting.sodium_embeddium_integ: Enables the XaeroPlus settings page in Sodium/Embeddium
xaeroplus.setting.world_map_ui_additions: Toggles whether additional XaeroPlus buttons and elements are added to the WorldMap GUI
xaeroplus.setting.waypoints_list_ui_addi: Toggles whether additional XaeroPlus buttons and elements are added to the Waypoints List GUI
xaeroplus.gui.minimap_incompatible.title: XaeroPlus는 Xaero's Minimap 또는 BetterPVP가 필요합니다
xaeroplus.setting.waystone_color.tooltip: Uses an optional preset color for all waystone waypoints or a random color.
Creates a separate waypoint set for waystone waypoints instead of adding them to the default set.
xaeroplus.setting.waystone_visibility_ty:
In-Game/Minimap Visibility Type 
 
 Local - only visible when in the maximum waypoint render distance 
 Global - always visible 
 World Map Loc. - not visible but is considered local 
 World Map Glo. - not visible but is considered global
xaeroplus.gui.world_map.drawing_mode_con:
왼쪽 클릭 -> 그리기 
 오른쪽 클릭 -> 지우기 
 휠 클릭 -> 패닝
xaeroplus.gui.draw_order.title: XaeroPlus Draw Order
xaeroplus.gui.draw_order.subtitle: Click and drag to change the order
xaeroplus.setting.teleport_fail_notifier: Sends a notification in chat when a xaero teleport is attempted and fails - most commonly due to lacking server permissions
Number of ticks to wait for an attempted xaero teleport to occur
xaeroplus.gui.teleport_fail_notifier.mes:
Looks like your teleport attempt failed :( 
 Most likely you don't have permissions from the server to use /tp commands. 
 Ask your server owner for help!
